item.title: Adduser Command
item.description: Adduser Examples Add new user, set user id, disabled password (ssh key login still available) Add new user, set different home directory, set default shell Create a System User Add a User With a Different Primary Group Add a User Without Home Directory Add a User With Specific User Id Add a User With Specific Group Id Add User With a Disabled Login Adduser Examples Add new user, set user id, disabled password (ssh key login still available) sudo adduser username --uid <uid> --disabled-password Add new user, set different home directory, set default shell sudo adduser username --home /directory/path username --shell /bin/bash username Create a System User # Creates a new system user with first available system UID (1-999) # Adds the user to nogroup group # Creates a home directory for the user sudo adduser --system username Add a User With a Different Primary Group sudo adduser --ingroup groupname username Add a User Without Home Directory sudo adduser --no-create-home username Add a User With Specific User Id sudo adduser --uid 1000 username Add a User With Specific Group Id sudo adduser --gid 1000 username Add User With a Disabled Login sudo adduser --disabled-login username

item.title: Useradd Command
item.description: Useradd Examples Creating a User With Specific Home Directory Creating a User With Without Home Directory Creating a User With Specific User And Group ID Creating a User And Assign Multiple Groups Creating a User with Specific Login Shell Creating a System User Useradd Examples Creating a User With Specific Home Directory sudo useradd -m -d /opt/username username Creating a User With Without Home Directory sudo useradd -M username Creating a User With Specific User And Group ID sudo useradd -u 1500 username Creating a User And Assign Multiple Groups sudo useradd -g users -G wheel,developers username Creating a User with Specific Login Shell sudo useradd -s /usr/bin/zsh username Creating a System User sudo useradd -r username

item.title: Usermod Command
item.description: Usermod Examples Change User Home Directory Change User Primary Group Adding Group to an Existing User Change User Login Name Move User Home Directory to New location Change User Shell Change User and Group ID For User Usermod Examples Change User Home Directory sudo usermod -d /var/www/ username Change User Primary Group sudo usermod -g groupname username Adding Group to an Existing User sudo usermod -aG supgroup username Change User Login Name sudo usermod -l new_username username Move User Home Directory to New location sudo usermod -d /directory/path -m username Change User Shell sudo usermod -s /bin/bash username Change User and Group ID For User sudo usermod -u 888 -g 999 username
